title: 3 and Out - Not Buying Texans; Rams/Chargers Stadium Debacle; Huge NFC Sunday; Week 12 Preview; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Not Buying Texans; Rams/Chargers Stadium Debacle; Huge NFC Sunday; Week 12 Preview; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff gives his take on the Texans AFC South division TNF win over the Colts, why he's not buying Houston as a contender, the mess that is the Chargers unwanted existence in L.A., why this Sunday is huge for the elite teams in the NFC. He also previews the slate of Week 12 NFL games. He also answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
